players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Alice was killed last night. We need to discuss and figure out who the mafioso is among us."
You: "This is awful. We have to work together to find the mafioso. I have no clues right now."
Diana: "I know who the mafioso is. Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "I think we need more evidence before voting out Bob. Diana, why do you suspect him?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. We can't risk waiting any longer—voting him out now is our best chance to save the town."
